languages.text: "Нет... нет, не думаю. Скорее, реакция тела на продолжительную боль". {n}Хейнрикс горько усмехается.{/n} "Подумать только... за все эти годы я отвык от незамутненных импульсов. Я биомант, я способен глушить свои телесные реакции. Быть может, потому меня и использовали для этого... устройства. Из-за того, что я забыл, какой может быть боль. И из-за моего упрямства, не позволившего мне сдаться".

traits.locale_text: "Нет... нет, не думаю. Скорее, реакция тела на продолжительную боль". {n}Хейнрикс горько усмехается.{/n} "Подумать только... за все эти годы я отвык от незамутненных импульсов. Я биомансер, я способен глушить свои телесные реакции. Быть может, потому меня и использовали для этого... устройства. Из-за того, что я забыл, какой может быть боль. И из-за моего упрямства, не позволившего мне сдаться".

languages.text: "No... no, I don't think so. It is likely just my body reacting to extended bouts of pain." {n}Heinrix chuckles bitterly.{/n} "To think that I have forgotten what it's like to experience such basic impulses. As a biomancer, I can stifle my physical reactions. Perhaps that is why I was chosen for this... device. Because I had distanced myself from the sensation of pain. And because of my stubbornness that forbade me from surrendering."
languages.original_text: "Нет... нет, не думаю. Скорее, реакция тела на продолжительную боль". {n}Хейнрикс горько усмехается.{/n} "Подумать только... за все эти годы я отвык от незамутненных импульсов. Я биомант, я способен глушить свои телесные реакции. Быть может, потому меня и использовали для этого... устройства. Из-за того, что я забыл, какой может быть боль. И из-за моего упрямства, не позволившего мне сдаться".

traits.locale_text: "No... no, I don't think so. It's likely just my body reacting to prolonged periods of pain." {n}Heinrix chuckles bitterly.{/n} "To think that I had forgotten what it's like to experience such basic impulses. I am a biomancer. I can stifle my physical reactions. Perhaps that is why I was picked for this... device. Because I had distanced myself from the sensation of pain. And because of my stubbornness that forbade me from giving up."

I can stifle my physical reactions. Perhaps that is why I was picked for this... device. Because I had distanced myself from the sensation of pain. And because of my stubbornness that forbade me from giving up."

"No... no, I don't think so. It is likely just my body reacting to extended bouts of pain." {n}Heinrix chuckles bitterly.{/n} "To think that I have forgotten what it's like to experience such basic impulses. As a biomancer, I can stifle my physical reactions. Perhaps that is why I was chosen for this... device. Because I had distanced myself from the sensation of pain. And because of my stubbornness that forbade me from surrendering."

languages.text: 「いや…そうじゃない。長時間の痛みに体が反応しているだけかもしれない」{n}ハインリックスは苦笑いを浮かべる。{/n}「このような基本的な衝動を経験することがどのようなことなのか、私は忘れてしまったのだと思う。私はバイオマンサーだ。自分の身体的反応を抑えることができる。だからこの装置に選ばれたんだろう…痛みの感覚から距離を置いていたからだ。それに、降伏できない頑固さもあった」
languages.original_text: "No... no, I don't think so. It is likely just my body reacting to extended bouts of pain." {n}Heinrix chuckles bitterly.{/n} "To think that I have forgotten what it's like to experience such basic impulses. As a biomancer, I can stifle my physical reactions. Perhaps that is why I was chosen for this... device. Because I had distanced myself from the sensation of pain. And because of my stubbornness that forbade me from surrendering."

traits.locale_text: 「いや…そうじゃない。長時間の痛みに体が反応しているだけかもしれない」{n}ハインリックスは苦笑いを浮かべる。{/n}「このような基本的な衝動を経験することがどのようなことなのか、私は忘れてしまったのだと思う。私はバイオマンサーだ。自分の身体的反応を抑えることができる。だからこの装置に選ばれたんだろう…痛みの感覚から距離を置いていたからだ。それに、降伏できない頑固さもあった」

languages.text: “不……不，我觉得不是，可能只是由于我的身体对长期疼痛的反应。”{n}海因里希苦笑起来。{/n}“想想看，我已经快忘了这种基本冲动是什么感觉了。我是个生物系灵能者，可以抑制身体的反应。或许就是因为这个原因，他们才把我放进了这台……设备，因为我已经习惯于对痛苦感到麻木。当然，也是因为我非常固执，不肯放弃活下去的希望。”
languages.original_text: "No... no, I don't think so. It is likely just my body reacting to extended bouts of pain." {n}Heinrix chuckles bitterly.{/n} "To think that I have forgotten what it's like to experience such basic impulses. As a biomancer, I can stifle my physical reactions. Perhaps that is why I was chosen for this... device. Because I had distanced myself from the sensation of pain. And because of my stubbornness that forbade me from surrendering."

traits.locale_text: “不……不，我觉得不是，可能只是由于我的身体对长期疼痛的反应。”{n}海因里希苦笑起来。{/n}“想想看，我已经快忘了这种基本冲动是什么感觉了。我是个生物系灵能者，可以抑制身体的反应。或许就是因为这个原因，他们才把我放进了这台……设备，因为我已经习惯于对痛苦感到麻木。当然，也是因为我非常固执，不肯放弃活下去的希望。”

languages.text: «No... no, no lo creo. Es probable que solo sea la reacción de mi cuerpo a estos largos episodios de dolor». {n}Heinrix se ríe con amargura.{/n} «Y pensar que había olvidado lo que es experimentar impulsos tan básicos. Como biomante, puedo reprimir mis reacciones físicas. Quizá por eso me eligieron para este... dispositivo. Porque me había distanciado de la sensación de dolor. Y por mi tozudez, que me impedía rendirme».
languages.original_text: "No... no, I don't think so. It is likely just my body reacting to extended bouts of pain." {n}Heinrix chuckles bitterly.{/n} "To think that I have forgotten what it's like to experience such basic impulses. As a biomancer, I can stifle my physical reactions. Perhaps that is why I was chosen for this... device. Because I had distanced myself from the sensation of pain. And because of my stubbornness that forbade me from surrendering."

traits.locale_text: «No... no, no lo creo. Es probable que solo sea la reacción de mi cuerpo a estos largos episodios de dolor». {n}Heinrix se ríe con amargura.{/n} «Y pensar que había olvidado lo que es experimentar impulsos tan básicos. Soy un biomante. Puedo reprimir mis reacciones físicas. Quizá por eso me eligieron para este... dispositivo. Porque me había distanciado de la sensación de dolor. Y por mi tozudez, que me impedía rendirme».

languages.text: "Nein ... nein, das glaube ich nicht. Vermutlich ist das einfach nur die Reaktion meines Körpers auf längere Phasen voller Schmerz." {n}Heinrix lacht verbittert auf.{/n} "Dass ich tatsächlich vergessen habe, wie es ist, solche grundlegenden Impulse zu erleben ... Als Biomantiker kann ich meine körperlichen Reaktionen dämpfen. Vielleicht wurde ich deswegen für diese ... Apparatur ausgewählt. Weil ich mich davon distanziert habe, Schmerzen zu empfinden. Und weil meine Sturheit mir verboten hat, mich zu ergeben."
languages.original_text: "No... no, I don't think so. It is likely just my body reacting to extended bouts of pain." {n}Heinrix chuckles bitterly.{/n} "To think that I have forgotten what it's like to experience such basic impulses. As a biomancer, I can stifle my physical reactions. Perhaps that is why I was chosen for this... device. Because I had distanced myself from the sensation of pain. And because of my stubbornness that forbade me from surrendering."

traits.locale_text: "Nein ... nein, das glaube ich nicht. Vermutlich ist das einfach nur die Reaktion meines Körpers auf längere Phasen voller Schmerz." {n}Heinrix lacht verbittert auf.{/n} "Dass ich tatsächlich vergessen habe, wie es ist, solche grundlegenden Impulse zu erleben ... Ich bin Biomantiker. Ich kann meine körperlichen Reaktionen dämpfen. Vielleicht wurde ich deswegen für diese ... Apparatur ausgewählt. Weil ich mich davon distanziert habe, Schmerzen zu empfinden. Und weil meine Sturheit es mir verboten hat, aufzugeben."

languages.text: « Non... Non, je ne crois pas. C'est probablement juste une réaction de mon corps à la souffrance prolongée, {n}rit Heinrix avec amertume.{/n} Dire que j'avais oublié ce que c'était que de subir des impulsions aussi basiques... En tant que biomancien, je suis censé pouvoir réprimer mes réactions physiques. C'est d'ailleurs sans doute pour cette raison que j'ai été choisi pour... cet appareil. Parce que j'avais isolé toute sensation de douleur. Et parce que j'étais bien trop têtu pour abandonner. »
languages.original_text: "No... no, I don't think so. It is likely just my body reacting to extended bouts of pain." {n}Heinrix chuckles bitterly.{/n} "To think that I have forgotten what it's like to experience such basic impulses. As a biomancer, I can stifle my physical reactions. Perhaps that is why I was chosen for this... device. Because I had distanced myself from the sensation of pain. And because of my stubbornness that forbade me from surrendering."

traits.locale_text: « Non... Non, je ne crois pas. C'est probablement juste une réaction de mon corps à la souffrance prolongée, {n}rit Heinrix avec amertume.{/n} Dire que j'avais oublié ce que c'était que de subir des impulsions aussi basiques... Je suis un biomancien. Je suis censé pouvoir réprimer mes réactions physiques. C'est d'ailleurs sans doute pour cette raison que j'ai été mis dans... cet appareil. Parce que j'avais isolé toute sensation de douleur. Et parce que j'étais bien trop têtu pour abandonner. »

languages.text: "Hayır... Hayır, sanmıyorum. Muhtemelen bedenim uzun süre çektiği acılara tepki gösteriyordur." {n}Heinrix acı acı gülüyor.{/n} "Böylesine basit dürtüler hissetmenin nasıl bir şey olduğunu unutmuşum. Biyobaz olarak fiziksel tepkilerimi kısıtlayabiliyorum. Belki de bu yüzden beni bu cihaza bağlamışlardır. Kendimi acı hissinden uzaklaştırdığımdan, inatçılığım yüzünden teslim olmayacağım için."
languages.original_text: "No... no, I don't think so. It is likely just my body reacting to extended bouts of pain." {n}Heinrix chuckles bitterly.{/n} "To think that I have forgotten what it's like to experience such basic impulses. As a biomancer, I can stifle my physical reactions. Perhaps that is why I was chosen for this... device. Because I had distanced myself from the sensation of pain. And because of my stubbornness that forbade me from surrendering."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır... Hayır, sanmıyorum. Muhtemelen bedenim uzun süre çektiği acılara tepki gösteriyordur." {n}Heinrix acı acı gülüyor.{/n} "Böylesine basit dürtüler hissetmenin nasıl bir şey olduğunu unutmuşum. Bir biyobaz olarak fiziksel tepkilerimi kısıtlayabiliyorum. Belki de bu yüzden bu cihaz için beni seçmişlerdir. Kendimi acı hissinden uzaklaştırdığım ve inatçılığım yüzünden teslim olmayacağım için."
